round_2: ^You feel a strange sense of déjà vu...
^(This man... I've seen him before. The sweat, the way he looked at me. But something's... different.)
observe: ^He shifts nervously, glancing at the buttons. The elevator hums, motionless.
^Akward silence stretches. The air feels thick.
check_buttons: ^You press the emergency button again. Nothing. No sound, no light.
^MAN: "Yeah, I tried earlier. I think we’re stuck."
dialogue_explain: ^MAN: "Power probably tripped. Happened before in this building."
^A flicker in your mind — your hand trembling...

c-0: ^You didn't take the knife out, but you still hold on to it firmly.

inner_struggle: ^So obvious that the man turned around and looked at you.
^Startled by the sudden attention, you reached into your bag—
knife_prompt: ^You looked at the man standing next to you.
^Noticing your stare, he looked at you too.
failed_attack: ^Your vision blurs. You stagger... and suddenly, everything changes.
hesitation_reveal: ^MAN: "Are you okay? Why do you look so scared?"
Rescue_comes: ^Rescue arrives, bursting in. You’re on the ground, shaking.
^Officers pin you down as he retreats to the corner—
cctv: ^You see yourself reflected in the elevator’s glass.
^Not the radiant woman you imagined—your real self, unfiltered.
^And him... a normal man. Confused, frightened.
